Name: Jim
Text: Ah, Doge, you've finally arrived. Here to witness the grand event, hm?

Name: Doge
Text: You monster! Release Cheems immediately! Your reign of toe-sucking ends here!

Name: Jim
Text: Sucking toes? You think this is what this is all about, hm? A little perversion, some illicit fun in an abandoned factory? I'm almost disappointed, Doge

Name: Jim
Text: Your vision is too... small. I don't seek to suck his toes. No, no - I'm going to steal his power. Take his essence. I shall be the next Cheemsburbger.

Name: Jim
Text: After that, the sky's the limit! Unlimited power, to kill or suck as many toes as I could ever want! This, this is the future Doge!

Name: Doge
Text: Not if I stop you first!

Name: Jim
Text: Very well then. Have at you!

Name: Jim
Text: Cheems will, of course, have to die. But, a small price to pay for godhood, wouldn't you agree?

Name: Jim
Text: But enough talk. Have at you!
